  .tooltip {

  #addButton, #removeButton {
    border-radius: 6px;

<h3>Volume of Comments by Different Subreddits</h3>

An interactive temporal chart of comments volume per subreddit helps analyze your project by visualizing spikes and dips in comment activity over time highlights key events and changes in interest. It helps us in comparing subreddits to uncover which are most active within the scope of this political and humanitarian conflict
